original_text: He made him ride on the high places of the earth, that he might eat the increase of the fields; and he made him to suck honey out of the rock, and oil out of the flinty rock;
korean_text: 여호와께서 그가 땅의 높은 곳을 타고 다니게 하시며 밭의 소산을 먹게 하시며 반석에서 꿀을, 굳은 반석에서 기름을 빨게 하시며

sentences.original_text: He made him ride on the high places of the earth
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그를 땅의 높은 곳에 타게 하셨다

sentences.original_text: that he might eat the increase of the fields
and he made him to suck honey out of the rock
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그가 바위에서 꿀을 빨게 하셨다

sentences.original_text: and oil out of the flinty rock
